title: Inside Google’s new Halloween-themed playable Doodle
description: The Google Doodle is inspired by games like Nintendo’s “Splatoon,” online battle arena game “League of Legends,” and indie adventure game “Journey.”

title: You’ve decided to quit Twitter. Here’s what you can use to replace it.
description: The best alternatives to Twitter for people who don't want to stay on the Elon Musk-owned site.

title: Winter ice storms wreak havoc. Could penguins be the solution?
description: Canadian researchers have created a wired mesh inspired by Gentoo penguin feathers to naturally shed ice off surfaces and stave off the havoc that ice storms bring.

title: Twitter workers await their fate as Musk deputies evaluate their work
description: Tesla engineers were on-site to evaluate the Twitter staff’s code, workers said, as anxiety built around Musk’s silence.

title: How Facebook and TikTok are helping push Stop the Steal in Brazil
description: In the days before the presidential election, Meta and TikTok have steered millions toward conspiracy theories and extremist content, researchers say.
